snippet: Attendance has declined in the student section at Cameron Indoor Stadium, leading the university to regularly sell hundreds of those seats to nonstudents.
abstract: Student enthusiasm for Duke basketball seems to be waning; there is growing sentiment that Duke's home court Cameron Indoor Stadium has lost some of its craziness, and definitive evidence that it has lost some of its Crazies; basketball is an inextricable part of campus culture at Duke and part of the reason the school's identity is seems shaken by the declining fan base.
lead_paragraph: Attendance has declined in the student section at Cameron Indoor Stadium, leading the university to regularly sell hundreds of those seats to nonstudents.

headline.seo: Duke’s Cameron Crazies Lose Their Enthusiasm
headline.main: A Little Less Crazed at Duke
headline.print_headline: A Little Less Crazed at Cameron
